Text.Page:
Each floor of Raga Evala seems to have been used for advanced botanical research, plant evolution, energy metabolism, that sort of thing.

They didn't cover that in your military training? Unsurprising.

I believe the argons were trying to evolve plants into pure energy. They grew them in all these water tanks. Get some samples, but don't evolve into pure energy yourself!
They're further along than we thought. The director should hear about this.

Please destroy {@Creature:46#7004$$aquaas extractors} in surrounding rooms and collect samples.

I want to know whether the plants can really evolve into pure energy.
Evidence that plants can self-synthesize? That would mean limitless energy for the argons...
